plot: A young singer who is drafted in Naples falls for a posh rich girl and forgets about his true love: his colonel's daughter. Will he get back to her?
title: In ginocchio da te
plot_es: A young singer who is drafted in Naples falls for a posh rich girl and forgets about his true love: his colonel's daughter. Will he get back to her?
plot_en: A young singer who is drafted in Naples falls for a posh rich girl and forgets about his true love: his colonel's daughter. Will he get back to her?

cast.role: Beatrice Di Bassano - sister of Giorgio
cast.name: Margaret Lee
